biotools.summary: HATK(HLA Analysis Tool-Kit) is a collection of tools and modules to perform HLA fine-mapping analysis, which is to identify which HLA allele or amino acid position of the HLA gene is driving the disease. HLA fine-mapping analysis is an indispensable analysis in studies of autoimmune diseases.
